name: Brave Little Wisp (himisir)
description:
Guide all the lost souls to the waters of the afterlife and avoid being extinguished by the shadow lurkers!   Control: 
--------------------------------------
--------------------------------------
 Left Mouse Click/Hold to move. Mouse Wheel Scroll (or Q/E) for light range control.  Right-mouse hold for aiming decoy (Level Dependent)  Right Mouse Release for throwing decoy (Level Dependent)
---------------------------------------
---------------------------------------  Created by ratatatataskr and  himisir  Brackey's Game Jam 2022.
